column5: Hey anybody know the lake ice reports from north of madoc or Kaladar, or could take an educated guess...any info would be great.....I know bay of quinte has some spots frozen over so I would guess north of Madoc would be.
I think those lakes are too far East for most of the members on this board. Try google to search for other web sites. I am sure you will find another board that caters to the Eastern Ontario anglers.
I checked the sat photos and they all seem frozen but there is some fast flowing waters around that area so some never freeze too well, so if you don't know the area, check with locals
I've heard there was about 2 inches on Moira at the beginning of the week.
i was talking to a guy yesturday form kingtson and he was up on big gull lake 20 minutes north of kaladar ice fishing the smaller bays, said he caught 2 walleye and a bunch of small perch  Cheers!
Talk to JWL from the Niagara board.  He's got a camp up on Moira and probably knows how much Ice they have cause he's itchin' to head up there.  jjcanoe
